member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_NETWORK
member.summary: Defines network status codes for the Media Engine.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_NETWORK.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_NETWORK_IDLE
member.summary: The Media Engine has started the resource selection algorithm, and has selected a media resource, but is not using the network.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_NETWORK.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_NETWORK_LOADING
member.summary: The Media Engine is loading a media resource.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_NETWORK.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_NETWORK_NO_SOURCE
member.summary: The Media Engine has started the resource selection algorithm, but has not selected a media resource.
